item.title: CIENA CORP 10-K
item.description: CIENA CORP, which is in the Telephone & Telegraph Apparatus [3661] industry, SEC 10-K filing on December 16, 2022 had 44796 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: ciena - 472 instances 2022 - 357 instances business - 314 instances services - 308 instances million - 302 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
